CustomProfile.Description: Akuma (Akuma Mortis Immortal) is a horror‑themed shooter from Gamewax and Taito where demonic beasts are unleashed by evil rituals. Using a rune tactical system, players choose targets and chase enemies through nightmarish environments. The game employs Bi‑Optic 3D technology to make monsters leap off the screen, and each defeated beast unlocks deeper, more challenging content. It’s a terrifying on‑rails shooter filled with supernatural foes.
